headline: Diamondback Energy Extends Credit Agreement and Raises Dividend
summary: Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) is one of the best dividend stocks according to Jim Cramer. The company amended its Credit Agreement with Wells Fargo Bank on June 12, 2025. With the interest rates and certain fees reduced, the maturity date has been postponed to June 12, 2030. Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) is a Texas-based independent […]
